TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

Docs.summary: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a security tokens specified in the security header of the SOAP message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Typically, the LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of the SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of the SOAP message. These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
The LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause key identifier is placed within an `<SecurityTokenReference>` element.

Docs.param: The value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified identifier and array of types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string localId, class System.Type ownerType) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> property.

A <xref:System.Type> that is the type of security token that is referred to by the `localId` parameter. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause (string localId, byte[] derivationNonce, int derivationLength, Type ownerType);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string localId, unsigned int8[] derivationNonce, int32 derivationLength, class System.Type ownerType) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> property.

An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key. Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce%2A> method.
The size of the derived key. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property.

A <xref:System.Type> that is the type of security token that is referred to by the `localId` parameter. Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified identifier, nonce, derived key length an owner security token type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] does not support the creation of implied derived key identifiers. However, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] will process and consume an incoming SOAP message with implied derived key identifiers.

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message.
Docs.value: The value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Matches(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
Docs.returns: if is of type and the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> properties match the current instance; otherwise, . See the remarks for more details.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A match on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property occurs when one of the following happens:
- The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the instance represented by the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter is `null`.
- The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the current instance is `null`.
- The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property for the two instances are identical.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Matches (string localId, Type ownerType);
.method public hidebysig instance bool Matches(string localId, class System.Type ownerType) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the attribute for an XML element within the current SOAP message.
A <xref:System.Type> that is the type of security token that is referred to by the `localId` parameter.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified reference and type.
Docs.returns: if the and parameters match the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> properties; otherwise, . See the remarks for more details.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A match on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property occurs when one of the following happens:
- The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> propertyfor the current instance is `null`.
- The value of the `ownerType` parameter is `null`.
- The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> property is identical to the `ownerType` parameter for the current method.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of security token that is referred to by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> property.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Type> that contains the type of security token that is referred to by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ToString method returns a string that contains the values of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.LocalId%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.LocalIdKeyIdentifierClause.OwnerType%2A> properties.
